title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 210.18 - Stopping main event
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 210.18 - Stopping main event

State Regulations

In the event that inclement weather occurs during the
progress of the main event at an outdoor card, such card shall be continued, postponed or stopped in the discretion of the Commission. If a card is stopped
before the main event has concluded, the provisions of this Part shall apply as
to postponements and refunds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
210.18

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
